metadata.title: COFFEE MATE COFFEE CRISP Liquid Coffee Enhancer

images.alt: COFFEE MATE COFFEE CRISP Liquid Coffee Enhancer
COFFEE MATE Zero Sugar French Vanilla

text: COFFEE MATE COFFEE CRISP Liquid Coffee Enhancer

Take your coffee to the next level with the delicious and aromatic COFFEE MATE COFFEE CRISP Liquid Coffee Enhancer (828 ml). Just add a dash of the perfectly balanced real cocoa and baked wafer flavour to transform every cup of coffee into a deliciously creamy, Canadian, treat -not too heavy and not too sweet. Proudly prepared in Canada, lactose-free and cholesterol-free, simply shake the bottle before pouring and stir well to enjoy a fragrant and rich cup of coffee you can wake up to or recharge with.
COFFEE MATE COFFEE CRISP Liquid Coffee EnhancerFeatures and Benefits
COFFEE MATE COFFEE CRISP Liquid Coffee Enhancer (946 ml) elevates your coffee experience
Transforms your coffee with an exceptionally smooth and creamy taste with the delightful taste of cocoa and baked wafer
Only 35 calories per 1 tbsp (15 ml) serving

COFFEE MATE COFFEE CRISP Liquid Coffee EnhancerIngredients

Water, sugar, high oleic soy oil, cocoa, modified milk ingredients, salt, flavour and artificial flavour, dipotassium phosphate, cellulose gel, datem, mono- and diglycerides, cellulose gum, carrageenan.

In 2023, we changed our Coffee Mate Liquid shrink sleeves so that the label no longer needs to be removed and discarded prior to recycling; now the entire bottle, sleeve and cap are recyclable together and can be put into the blue box
